thread.title: BRIEF-Korea Cable TV Chung Buk System says conversion of 11th series convertible bonds into shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Korea Cable TV Chung Buk System says conversion of 11th series convertible bonds into shares

organizations.name: brief-korea cable tv chung buk system
reuters) - korea cable tv chung buk system co ltd

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Korea Cable TV Chung Buk System Co Ltd :
* Says 850 million won worth of its 11th series convertible bonds have been converted into 1.7 million shares of the co, at 500 won/share
* Says listing date of new shares is Jan. 22
Source text in Korean: goo.gl/oVXrPq
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
